Great stay! This was my second stay at the Factory. The room was nice and clean. The Boho theme is great! Please check the plants when you get to the room. They were a bit dry so I made sure to give them water. The best part of the room is how sunny it is! If you like lots of natural light this is a great room.
It‚Äôs not far from the airport and there is a lot to do around Manchester. I visit for work, but I like the convenience of shopping.
This was such an amazing find. My boyfriend and I stayed the weekend and it was such a welcoming atmosphere here. I would definitely return again!!
One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in! The hosts were very responsive and helpful. The room looked exactly like the pictures, and the natural light was amazing.

this has been my favorite place thus far. I wish I could live there!! the artsy vibe is right up my alley and everything was A++++ and when I went to leave at 6:30 am and then realizing I had left my cell phone in the apt with the keys inside and a security door I managed to text Mariana (the host) from another device and thankfully she responded immediately and guided me through getting back in and up to the room to retrieve my phone. she was excellent and just all around amazing and friendly esp for that early in the am. I would have understood if she hadnt gotten right back to me but I was thrilled that she did. make my stressful mistake a breeze to get through so I could get on with my day. she's the perfect host. thank you Mariana, for everything I absolutely will be back as soon as possible. the bedding/ mattress/ pillows were an absolute dream to sleep on.
Fantastic stay‚Äîhad everything I needed, was very clean and safe!
love the place
This is my 5th stay at a loft space hosted by Mariana and they have all been wonderful. She and her cohosts provide the perfect Airbnb experience. A thousand stars.
This was the perfect Airbnb for us. I loved the local vibes there.
Great place to stay. Clean nice and cozy. Only did not like the pillows.

Mariana‚Äôs BoHo Retreat was everything that was listed and more. Beautiful large windows tons of sunlight. The art from the local artists throughout the property was very beautiful. Would recommend staying here whenever in town.
Perfect stay! Unit was spotless and had incredible natural light - very clean and great location / value for the price.
Clean, quiet and comfortable. Also felt very safe and secure
Beautiful location in a gorgeous building - incredible ambiance!!

Would definitely come here again. Very safe and just like the pictures - aesthetically pleasing and clean and bright! Lot of safety measures with the check in process that I highly appreciated as a solo traveler.
stay here regularly for work. very reliable.

This is my go-to place to stay when I‚Äôm in town. It appears the hosts are responsive to reviews/comments, as several items I would have enjoyed having in the rooms in the past are now included. Lovely place to stay!
Nice place

Lovely place to stay for our visit, so comfortable and clean and quickly felt right at home. Being on the top floor meant lovely sunlight in the mornings. Host was proactive and friendly and also gave us a heads up for the plow car. Easy to check in and out.

Mariana was so kind and gracious when I had an issue with booking an additional day. Mariana even gave us a piece of her Christmas cactus to bring back to the Vineyard with us!
I didn‚Äôt realize that there was a place for garbage and we left ours tied up together. That was completely my fault, I missed it in the directions on where to dispose of it.
The place had a great vibe and we really enjoyed our stay!

My flight got cancelled out of Manchester, so I had a 2 day layover. I was very happy to avoid a hotel room, and to have a nice, comfortable, affordable place to hang out and read a couple great books. Thanks, Mariana!

Thank you to Mariana and the Factory on Willow team! This was definitely one of my favorite AirBnB locations I've ever stayed at. Even though this studio is located in a historic factory building, the windows and central air/heat worked perfectly to protect us from the cold 20-degree weather outside. We could not have possibly been more comfortable. Thank you again for a great stay and I look forward to booking here in the future when I visit again.
I keep staying here because it works on so many levels. thanks mariana

We had a wonderful stay! Mariana was very helpful and answered our questions immediately. This Airbnb is so beautiful, clean, and peaceful. It is close to downtown and other attractions in the area. We would definitely stay there again!
Always a pleasure staying here
Mariana is a pro at this. Great building, interesting rooms and nice vibe.
Mariana was very responsive and the apartment was wonderful.
I have stayed here many times: excellent spaces, well designed, with easy, flexible pick-up, and parking in one of two lots. The rooms themselves are beautiful.
The Factory is my favorite place to stay

Mariana‚Äôs place was described exactly as listed! The place was spacious bright and squeaky clean. The location itself was very cool, we loved the comic book store on the main level of the building! And so much to do nearby. I would definitely stay here again if I‚Äôm in the area!
Fantastic stay, clean room, easy check in and check out!
Great place
Amazing building and apartment. Very comfortable bed, clean atmosphere, beautiful plants, and fitting for everything we needed.

This apartment was pretty much perfect for what I was looking for.
I wish I had booked it for a longer stay.
The place was great to kick the jet lag and I loved the free Netflix! Made for a perfect time to be away from the rest of the world.
Great location. Easy to get into. Clean and cute room.
Great place, clean and well laid out. Location was perfect, less than a mile from downtown- was able to walk everywhere. Definitely recommend
Very well presented and clean studio in a very well looked after development.

Nice place to stay, on the smaller side, but it's comfortable. The only nitpicky things I would have are that there is not any extra bedding (other pillows or blankets) and weirdly no tissues. Only reason I noticed this is because I can get bad seasonal allergies. Also sad that, after asking an employee at the bottom floor, that the bean shop described, was apparently not there anymore? I could be wrong and I should have asked the host. Overall, nice location, a little loud, but I'm a heavy sleeper, so that didn't matter to me.
super clean and stylish with lots of amenities. Super walkable location and gorgeous loft.
I've been here many times. Very well maintained.
It was wonderful! Gorgeous!
Great deal especially for a business purpose. Easy to find, secure building, close to most corporate locations in town
The space was so bright and open. The windows and high ceilings make the space seem even bigger. Perfect size for 2. Despite being a large building, it was SO quiet the entire time we were there.
I enjoyed my birthday there last weekend and it was peaceful. It was nice to get away alone and I felt safe
lady accused me of smoking in the hall way when I went outside üòí every time and I left a back pack and had to do excessive driving to get accused of smoking little rude
Great location, short drive/walk to downtown and other amenities. Beautiful clean room!
Mariana has been outstanding and I have stayed with her properties several times. Top Notch!
It was a very convenient space and location. Thank you for allowing us to stay.
Awesome stay!
again, for the 4th stay, it is always good. I have 4 more stays planned

Beautiful home, well pictured. The natural lighting from the windows was great. Bathroom was spacious. Closet space was easy to access. Pots and pans were accessible. My fianc√© and I did cook meals, sink is small. Be cautious of tidying up as you good. No knives or cutting board but a wonderful experience. Would stay again!
This was an extremely clean and well themed boho space. Very helpful host. Big Windows and natural lighting made space feel open & bigger.

Mariana was a great host! Very friendly, responsive, and understanding when we accidentally slept in past check-out time. Shoutout the very comfortable bed! The place was beautiful and exactly as pictured in the listing. The brick walls with the plants and macrame decor were comforting and felt like home! Check-in/out was very easy. Overall an amazing stay! Thank you Mariana!
Great place to stay!!
Great space, very communicative and helpful host. Great price and just as advertised.

Bohemian Paradise is just that... Paradise. It felt like home immediately. I had everything I needed plus more. The studio apartment is in an old mill building with stores on the first floor for an extra perk. Great location. I felt safe and secure the whole time. I will be trying out the other themed rooms next time I need a getaway.
We had a wonderful time this weekend. The accommodations were beautiful! Would definitely stay here again.

We rented a few rooms to stay at during our wedding reception at the venue located downstairs. The rooms were AMAZING. So clean, meticulous, beautiful views and you can tell they think of every detail from the guest point of view. 100% recommend.
Beautiful facility with a host of amenities. Very convenient location and attentive staff. Highly recommend
I enjoyed staying there. Unfortunately my boyfriend is on probation and we weren't informed that having a probation officer was against the rules there, as we were informed we weren't welcome back.
The perfect Airbnb for a getaway weekend.

Definitely experienced a ghost, that said the rest of the stay was wonderful. Very interesting key system for moving around the building. If you‚Äôre looking for a reason to come I would say the location is the best part of this room. It‚Äôs far enough from the city to where you can‚Äôt hear the traffic and close enough to get where you‚Äôre going comfortably. Old building and a nice comic shop on the ground level. Make sure to be respectful in the room however, you never know who‚Äôs watching üëÄüëªüëª
such a funky building, nice gym, nice room. you're going to need a car to get anywhere. not walkable

Thank you for the easy and relaxing stay! Wonderful accommodations, just as described. Picturesque room and views. I loved the room and all the amenities. Great design and fun art vibe in this remodeled warehouse.
The area felt quiet and safe, while being very active and inhabited. The building feels like a popular place to visit because of the awesome chocolate shop.
I felt like if I needed anything or had questions, I could easily find a response.

Brilliant concept! So nice to see a lovingly reclaimed old brick factory building turned into a modern and tasteful space to stay. The boho room was WONDERFUL with floor to ceiling windows, yummy sunshine, the perfect little studio kitchen, and plant friends hanging in macrame in the south facing windows. 100% better experience than staying in a hotel! Thank you so much for creating this option for Manchester!
Very clean, very secure feeling, surprisingly quiet location, close to good food, good size for a couple. Pretty ideal Airbnb. Would stay again for sure.

Safe, quiet, cozy, and clean! exactly how it looks in pictures. I had to stay there for graduate school things for a couple days and found I was able to study and enjoy the space easily. Mariana is very responsive and kind, with clear instructions.
Beautiful place
Great place

We had a great time at this Airbnb. The place was lovely and bright and the bed was comfortable. It was not too far from downtown and other nearby attractions. If we ever stay in Manchester again, we‚Äôd definitely stay at one of Mariana‚Äôs places.
Modern, clean cool space! Great building!

Best bed we ever slept in! like for real...this was so great. the whole apartment was really nice and we would have loved to even stay a bit longer if we would have had the time. The apartment has everything you need. Even if you find something that you miss...Mariana will take care of it immediately. You can't go wrong with this one.
Mariana was very helpful and responsive to any requests we had. The apartment was delightful, and well located for our needs. Would def stay here again.
Third time staying at the Factory in the Boho room. Fantastic everything! Mariana is awesome!
Great stay for a few nights. Clean and comfortable.
My second time staying at this location. Excellent every time, feels like my home away from home. Quiet, clean, safe, nice, and very comfortable.

Lovely Boho Retreat apartment in a unique setting, but some of the missing necessities made an impact. Basics such as an extra blanket and pillow, tissues, and a cutting knife would have made a nice difference. Some renters complained of noise from local businesses, but after a three nights, we found it quite peaceful. The entry keypad does not work well and we learned on our last day that the key fob opens the door! Communication about that, and where to take out garbage, would have been helpful. DO NOT forget to put parking pass in the car window! The building seemed deserted, the hallway had a strange smell, and there were no food trucks, but on the whole, we wanted a unique and peaceful location and that‚Äôs what we got.

I loved being here. The location is amazing. I told my friends to book here! It‚Äôs super clean and so safe feeling. Also wicked cool to have a food truck option. This was my first time booking an Airbnb and the interaction with Mariana was so positive and understanding. She is legit a super host. I‚Äôll def book her again in a heart beat.

We had a great stay at the Factory on Willow. The studio was very nice! Exactly as described. Great amenities in the building. Check in/check out process was easy. Great view for 4th of July fireworks. Would definitely stay here again.

Honestly best bed and pillows ive ever had from any hotel or BNB. The building is very secure and is within walking distance of many bars and restaurants.
Rooms atmosphere was very cozy and my fiance was in love with it.
A great stay. What you see is what you get. The Factory is an interesting housing & work-space concept.

The Factory is an affordable and fun getaway for anybody coming to the area. There are aspects of the place that are so cool (original wood from shoe factory, a bookstore, and even an authentic phone booth). We did not take advantage of the events but there was live music and even a food truck. A millenials dream. Great value. Just be aware that you are next to a bright and decently loud area as a trucking company is across the street. I am a CDL driver myself so I have sympathy but it can get a bit loud. The darkening shades helped but just beware and plan accordingly. We had a blast!

Wonderful stay. Great building amenities of the gym and game room. Most comfortable bed. Beautiful windows of views to wake up to the sun. Convienant for 15 minute walk to downtown. Chic and comfortable furnishing
My husband and I stayed here while in town and it was absolutely perfect! We loved the vibe of the whole building and the host was so responsive! We will definitely come back
Wonderful air bnb! Comfortable bed, super clean and adorable decorations. The whole building is very well kept and feels very safe. Can‚Äôt wait to come again!
Can‚Äôt beat the price on this cute studio apartment! Clean and stocked with anything you could possibly need with the convenience of being near food and other downtown locations
I had a wonderful stay. I would definitely stay here again. 5/5
Meticulously clean room! Good first Airbnb experience!

When we arrived we had a little hiccup with our original room. I messaged Mariana and she responded quickly and moved us to a new room. This room was way better and we enjoyed it. The location was near plenty of shopping and restaurants. Overall it was a very nice stay.

The space was clean (outside of kitchen counter utensils) and bright. Check-in was easy. I appreciated the water fill-up station in the lobby and the thoughtful, functional room set-up. Found the unit to be noisy with street, airplane and heating element noises. My back didn't love the bed, but if you like super soft beds you'll love this one! Pretty convenient location but you'll def want to have a car to get to shopping and dining.
Clean and convenient!

We loved our experience at The Factory! The room was incredibly clean and everything we needed was provided. Check in instructions are very thorough, and there are maps on the wall in the lobby if you don't know where to find your room.
If you're like me and you live in the country and aren't used to being centrally located, just a heads up to remember to close the shades BEFORE you shower üòÇ
Modern feel. Awesome place to stay!

this was such a beautiful studio to stay in and it was located to all the things you could want to do! it was close by to amazing food and fun shopping. the apartment itself was beautiful and so clean. checking in was a breeze and we would love to stay here again when we visit New Hampshire in the future!
Great place, plenty of light!
Really nice place to live at. The host is really nice and friendly. Worth the price for sure!
This little apartment was perfect for my needs. It was cute, clean, comfortable, and convenient. I‚Äôll definitely be back in the future!

Everything was great; the house was clean, easy to find. The host was great, and communication was good. The only downsides the street noise was high and we weren't given a parking pass and our car was towed. I'm sure it wasn't intentional, but be sure to ask about parking just to make sure. Otherwise, it was a good stay.
Very nice studio!!

The studio was amazing! Less than 10 minutes to downtown and truly the best restaurants I have ever been to! The price was worth it and the entire building was clean and even had a small game room in the basement that we took advantage of while waiting for our laundry. Place was truly worth the price and would recommend to anyone staying in the area!
Fantastic room, building, and amenities. We loved staying here!
This place was so cute! We loved the bathroom and the sheets were so soft! Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Great cozy place to stay! The check-in was super convenient and the place was very clean. Fantastic location if you want a short trip into Boston or to go for an arduous hike in the mountains!

The factory was so neat! The room was clean and the windows opened up to see the sunrise! the building itself was a whole experience within itself. So if you are wanting a taste of the city this is your place!
Great place to stay
Mariana is responsive to questions.
Great space and easy travel to food, downtown, pharmacy, grocery. And day trips up north to the mountains! We stayed for a week and felt right at home at the Factory. Great for short and longs stays.

I loved my stay at the Boho Paradise apartment. The unit is really cute and comfortable and Mariana was very easy to communicate with. I would recommend this spot for those looking for a place to stay in Manchester. Thanks again Mariana!
Excellent host. No complaints
Great place to stay ! Would recommend anybody stay here !
We had an amazing stay! Everything was just as pictured and described. The building is very beautiful
Cute and comfy spot! Very clean and worth the money.

The place was very nice and clean! The giant windows provided lots of natural sunlight, which was amazing! One thing to note is that there‚Äôs an auto body shop right outside the window and an exhaust shop down the road. The guys are up and working early and sometimes work late. The boho paradise was a very cute, clean place to stay.
The whole building was very clean, and friendly, as was the actual AirBnb. Loved the stay, the plants were a fantastic addition!
Such a cozy place to stay at do recommend this place, loved how beautiful it look. My fav part was sleeping in those comfy blankets!

My partner and I had a wonderful time at the Boho Paradise Airbnb. The space was clean and comfortable. The Airbnb was very close to downtown Manchester, NH which was a great city to spend time in. We were thankful to Mariana for a great experience and we would stay at Airbnb‚Äôs she hits if we‚Äôre in the area again.

Beautiful room, stylish, comfortable, and very clean! The room is located in a restored factory building and is fully updated while keeping some of the ascetic elements from the original factory (wood beams, original hard wood floors etc). Ample parking and very safe building and location. 10/10 would recommend!

We enjoyed our stay here. Mariana was very helpful in communicating with us before we checked-in, and we felt that if we had any questions during our stay, we would get answers quickly. The space is very cute and cozy inside, and the Factory Apartment Complex that the apartment is located in is a very cool space as well. However, the surrounding area is very industrial, and the walks between the apartment and the downtown area are not the most scenic. The place itself is very bare-bones, but the natural light, plants, TV, and stovetop in the kitchen make it great for a weekend getaway.
This place was very clean, organized, and so cute! I will be coming back!!

This loft was PERFECT for our short stay in Manchester. Such easy check in and check out, great accommodations, quaint, quiet, and delightful! We wanted to stay in our little loft and relax all day! Mariana was also very communicative and lovely to work with.

I can't say enough great things about the Factory space. The space is new, clean with everything you need. I used the workout space and was able to eat in my studio or go out. It was a quiet space to relax, but easy to get downtown if you wanted more of that feel. My only worry is that when I come back to Manchester, they will be so popular, I won't get a room! This is a great place to stay for work, staycation, or a get away. I used it as my "homebase" to see other parts of NH (seacoast & white mountains) as day trips. Highly recommend it!
This place is a gem! Beautiful high ceilings, fast wifi, lots of natural light, spacious mini fridge, and more!
The stay was great at Mariana‚Äôs. It was a great location, and the apartment was very neat.

Awesome studio apartment. Very convenient to a lot of things by car. I wouldn‚Äôt advise walking downtown from here. Check in was a breeze, and Mariana graciously let us check in a couple of hours early. We loved the mattress, very comfortable for both of us, though we have very different preferences. The plants are such a nice touch. I recommend ear plugs if you‚Äôre a light sleeper, as walls between units are thin and there are lot of active birds in the morning. For the price I would definitely recommend and return.

You cannot go wrong with Mariana and The Factory. Her communication is prompt and accurate. With my changing travel plans, she was flexible and opened a new unit early to extend my stay. Above all, Mariana is a truly nice person who exudes positivity and good humor.
Place as expected, very clean and good location for my purposes. Very friendly & quick communication. Would recommend for sure!
Really enjoyed our stay. Will definitely stay there again.
Perfect place to stay for a few days in Manchester. Place with Nice and clean and the shower very relaxing, thanks, Kevin
This was my first time staying at an AirBnB. This place was close to the house my daughter lives in. We could walk to her house. I will definately check out AirBnB the next time I visit her. Thanks
Kevin was very responsive and flexible for some last minute changes.
perfect little apartment
The place was comfy and clean and Kevin was super helpful! A perfect place to stay for my three days in Manchester!
Kevin was very welcoming to us and our fur babies! The space was small, but oddly very spacious! 10/10 would stay again!
Kevin was super responsive respectful and always answered within 2-3 minutes if I needed anything flexible and helpful I will always book with him when I need to book air bnbs thank you so much
Quiet, peaceful room with everything you need. :) Host is kind and responsive.

This place was perfect for us. The location is great, very close to downtown restaurants, etc. Very clean and exactly as it was described. It is in a quiet neighborhood and you park right out front on the street. The bed was comfortable (and warm), the weather was really cold when we were there in January. Nice place.

Kevin‚Äòs studio was small but cute. It had all the necessities and was well worth the price, but there was really no place to sit and relax. There was the bed, and then counter height wooden stools. That was clear from the pictures, so shame on me for not noticing. The place is great if you‚Äôre just looking for a place to sleep. Kevin was very accommodating. Nice, clean and a great value for the area.

Kevin was extremely responsive, in two languages! There was a small issue with the water at one point, and as soon as I said something, he immediately explained and fixed it. The location was perfect for us, being close to family, and the bed was comfortable. We will be back!
Kevin's place is a very cozy and comfortable, great to hangout
thank you for the stay!
The apartment was spotless. The bedding was very comfortable. The location was perfect for us.

Kevin's place was so cozy and welcoming. We drove up that weekend for my graduation and the studio was extremely close to my college and within minutes of several restaurants. Next time I come to Manchester, I will def reach out to Kevin to stay here. Thank you, Kevin, for making our stay enjoyable.

Nice place to stay very near downtown. The Airbnb is as advertised in the photos. You can park right out front. Easy to get in; two windows for natural light. Do check out the Bearded Bakery, only a block away. Great pastries for breakfast!

Great house, fit our entire family‚Ä¶.it helped create a great end to our daughter‚Äôs 4 years at Saint Anselm College. Kevin was immediately responsive, (although we didn‚Äôt need anything). It was close to college & close to Elm Street, Manchester which has many restaurants, shopping, etc. Beds were comfortable, well stocked towels, wash clothes. Kitchen was well stocked. Large yard (although it rained).
Enough parking for our 4 vehicles. Overall, we would recommend!
The house was perfect for our family of 5. Corner lot in a safe neighborhood. Location was easy to get around Manchester and Bedford. Very comfortable beds! Thanks Kevin!!
Very well, I loved the place. I felt at home. The spacious house is quiet. I hope to return soon
Great location, very relaxing and quiet, pristine accommodations. Near downtown, great walking trail. Very well-maintained and clean residence. Would stay here again.

Lovely home! I recommend this Airbnb and will probably rent again. Lots of room for our group of 11 people. It‚Äôs was great to have a fenced in yard for little ones. Close to restaurants and shopping.
Had a great stay. very nice home!
Very nice home in a quiet area, spacious and accommodating to a good sized group. Would absolutely book again if I was in town.

This stay was not too bad but the house was not very clean. There was heavy dust in several places, the walls, doors, and light switches were filthy. There was mold in one bathroom and the other had an unpleasant odor. In the kitchen there was food and ants on the (sticky) floor and hair and crumbs in the freezer. The towels and bedding smelled suspiciously of febreze and not laundry detergent.
Otherwise, the location was good and with a proper cleaning, I think this would be a fantastic stay.
plenty of space for 4 coworkers to travel together. Kevin was accommodating and responsive. a good value
The house was perfect for what we needed. Very clean house, safe neighbourhood, plenty of towels, linen, kitchen utensils, etc. The beds are VERY comfortable. Kevin was very helpful and responsive.
The rooms were spacious, the kitchen had everything we needed, and our host was friendly and responsive.
Nice large home. Very comfortable bed. Very nice to have fenced yard for dogs.
Good location close to Elm St...quick drive up 93 to ski resorts
Our host, Kevin was super helpful and communicative. His house was pristinely clean, Devore was very nice and beds so comfortable. Looking forward to our next stay
Clean and warm, spacious enough for four in separate bedrooms, well-equipped kitchen

This was our first airbnb stay so we were a bit nervous with what to expect, but this was a great experience. Kevin was thorough with instructions and very timely with responses when we needed something.
The home was very private, clean and had plenty of space.
Nice place, clean and Kevin was great to work with.

Kevin's is a great place! It is a big house, in a great location--safe and quite and also close to all the centric locations and restaurants in downtown Manchester. Our dog enjoyed the fenced-in yard and we felt right at home with the well-equipped kitchen. The house is really big and so convenient and comfortable for a big group. Our host was friendly, extremely responsive, and helpful. We will definitely be coming back!
Perfect home from home. Plenty of room and everything we needed
Kevin was very responsive and the place was absolutely perfect and so comfortable clean and he was so helpful
Great choice!
The house was perfect. It had everything we needed.
Nice place at a fair price. Location was decent and Kevin was flexible with the check in.
Good place

My first time using an air BNB. Kevin was very responsive (and quick) to my questions. It was in a good location. And gps directions brought us right to it. It worked out great for my family to get together with us all coming from different states. Six adults stayed here. Everything you could need was provided in this home. Good size rooms. The beds were very comfortable. Having 2 bathrooms was a plus. All and all we had a wonderful time and were thankful to be able to stay here together. Thanks.
Great stay - easy proximity to Manchester; comfortable house for 4 colleagues traveling for work. Thank you!
Great place

Great for larger group or family. Fenced yard, parking, laundry, kitchen amenities and comfortable clean beds. Older home. can tell owners updating. Very convenient to Manchester Airport.
Manchester itself is an old Mill town. Area reflects that. Beats paying for hotel, or rental.
Kevin was a great host, very easy to communicate with. The place is lovely and will be staying again.
wonderful

Perfect house for visiting from out of state. I had grandchildren staying with us and the house was perfectly safe! I didn't have to go around and child proof everything. Ample space for little ones to run and play in a large fenced yard. Plenty of beds for everyone. It was perfect!

110 Westland Ave was very easy to find - GPS took us directly to the home. The location was as advertised, very close to the Manchester Airport. The home is VERY CLEAN with all necessary appliances. Regular & reliable communication with the Host was much appreciated. 4 comfortable-sized bedrooms & 2 clean bathrooms were more than enough for our 6 tenants. All good. Strong recommendation.

Very nice home with tvs everywhere!
clean, big fenced yard for dog.
Great place to stay. We stayed there with family to attend a wedding. The place was very comfortable. We loved the big table to sit around and talk. The house had lots of amenities.

Such a great Airbnb. Big house, big backyard fenced in, and everything was well-stocked and clean. We walked to a playground on the edge of the neighborhood, which was shaded. Would absolutely stay here again.
Kevin‚Äôs place was great and exactly what we were looking for. Kevin was a very responsive host as well. Would recommend.

We stayed here while we visited several places in New Hampshire. It was easy to find and get in to. The kitchen was spacious and had everything we needed. It has a nice backyard. Neighborhood was quiet. The AC worked well which we appreciated cause it was hot and muggy outside. Wide driveway - we only had one car so plenty of space for us. Nice dining table - good for playing games.

Our family was very pleased with the house, and all the amenities provided. it was like home away from home. We only had to buy our food, everything else was well stocked. We had use of a very nice washer & dryer which was great. Kevin, our host promptly replied to any questions asked, & very polite. We would not hesitate to return if the situation arises.
Very good and very quiet, we had a pleasant night.

The person I was staying with asked me how the home was listed, and before I could answer he said, ‚Äúit‚Äôs so quiet here. Surprisingly so. They should highlight that.‚Äù The neighborhood is very accurately described. Not far from anything in the city without feeling like it. The yard is lovely and being fenced in made it perfect for the dog. The house itself is spacious, clean, and comfortable. Kevin is also very accurately described as a Superhost. I would definitely recommend for anyone looking to feel at home when not at home!
Great rental! Kevin is very accommodated and I‚Äôm a repeat rental. Definitely will rent again.
would stay again
We had a great stay here- plenty of space and wonderfully setup!
Had a great Stay. He had everything we needed in the house.

Kevin's house was absolutely beautiful. We had a group of 7 from Nova Scotia, and it accommodated us perfectly. There was plenty of space for us all, having 2 full bathrooms was a great bonus for everyone.
We will definitely be staying here again whenever we are in the area.
The entire group highly recommends this property.
Always a great stay!

Kevin's place was great for my family, we had 6 of us staying there. The kitchen was spacious and had everything we needed to make a simple pasta dinner. The house was spotlessly clean. The mattresses were just the right firmness for comfortable sleeping.
Thanks Kevin!
Big yard for the pups, clean and responsive host. Would stay again!

It was a perfect stay, Kevin the communication was easy, quick and simpler.
